name: TomoPakku
description:
Feed and Play with Pakku 'til he's all grown up! He loves fruit, rolling around, and mostly... YOU! The state of the art virtual pet TomoPakku is taking the world by storm! Feed him cherries to make him GROW! Feed him a banana to make him SPEEDY! Help him play with his GOLDEN COIN, then do it all again!

Raise Pakku carefully and he'll grow into a splendid creature, but be careful! If things go wrong, he may NEVER leave the nest!

Made for the Goblin Bunker Game Jam October 2022!
